pageProduct.name: Olay Total Effects Foaming Cleanser 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Total Effects Foaming Cleanser helps remove excess oil. Gentle cleanser that removes dirt and excess oil to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, enhancing skins natural radiance.

  • Minimises the appearance of pores, fine lines and wrinkles
  • Helps remove excess oil.
  • Gets rid of dirt.
  • Removes make-up
  • Fights dullness and replaces it with a healthy-looking radiance
  • Maintains skin's moisture balance
  • Gentle on skin and doesn't overdry
    Non-comedogenic
  • Recommended to use before the Olay Total Effects 7 in 1 Day Cream during the day and Olay Total Effects 7 in 1 Night Cream at night

Olay Total Effects Foaming Cleanser is a daily foaming cleanser that revitalises skin with gentle cleansing to provide 7 anti-ageing benefits in 1. It has a foamy lather that gently removes dirt and impurities while enhancing skin's natural radiance. Youthful radiance starts day 1!

 

Find out more at Olay.com.au

 

Size: 100g

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Total Effects Foaming Cleanser has a foamy lather that gently removes dirt and impurities while revitalizing skin.
• Total Effects fights 7 signs of aging by: • Cleansing skin thoroughly • Maintaining skin's moisture balance • Refining to minimise the appearance of pores • Minimising the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles • Fighting dullness and replacing it with a healthy-looking radiance • Maintaining skin's smooth feel • Gently purifying
• 7 Cleansing Benefits In 1 Washes away impurities for fresher and younger looking skin all skin types Helps remove excess Oil. Gets rid of Dirt. Removes Make Up. Gentle on skin. Does not over dry. Helps lift away dull surface skin. Non Comedogenic

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Potassium Hydroxide, Lauric Acid, Polyquaternium-10, DMDM Hydantoin, Fragrance, Pentasodium Pentetate, Butylene Glycol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Niacinamide.

Directions

Dispense a small amount of product into hands. Add water and work into lather. Massage gently onto face and neck. Rinse thoroughly.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
